name: Abnormal (DokiDok1)
description:
This game submitted for Paint Jam but long this time 2021. 

This game about avoiding the enemy.

The character is an abnormal than the others so it must avoid the others to save its live. The characters will decrease its speed so it must pick the certain items with green color or yellow color to maintain it speed.

Use your arrow button on your keyboard to move your character.

Challenges I picked on Paint Jam but long this time 2021:

  • Only use the default MS Paint color palette.
  • Use only comic sans for any in-game font.
  • Draw your assets without a drawing tablet.
  • Try to make the title/logo without any real type/font.
